name: Knight Move 3D
description: A 3D recreation of Alexey Pajitnov's 1990 puzzle game 'Knight Move'. Programmed by a team of three using C++ in an OpenGL-based engine.

name: VRn't
description: A satirical arcade game playable in browser. Made in Unity over 72 hours in a team of four for the Ludum Dare 41 game jam, where it ranked among the top 20 games in

name: Space Station Scoober
description: An experimental action arcade game playable in browser. Built in the game engine Pico-8.

name: Antiqua
description: An illustrated self-published collection of my poetry. Available for purchase online in a digital format.
